title: I NEED HELP?
body: My account somehow got permanently suspended. Not sure how but anyways is there anything i can do to fix this?

replies.body:
Hi TalonFlare,

A proactive ban was placed on your account as we believe it was compromised and being used by someone else. We need you to [submit a ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and go through the account recovery process in order for it to be unlocked. Details on this process can be found here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account

Let me know if you have any questions.
Riot Gehrin, i have when i press on the link to submit a ticket, it shows me 3 different request types, which one do i press?
The first option is fine. Then under category select Account>Recovery.
If you have the time to reply to this, could you also please reply to the countless others who are having RADS and errors with the download links?
They haven't found a solution yet I believe.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=G2oqt6i8,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-15T22:59:49.929+0000)
>
> They haven't found a solution yet I believe.

if that is the case, would be nice if they just posted on some posts saying they havent got a solution yet, but are looking into it, thats all i ask for, that way i know something is getting done about it.

This issue should be resolved globally, but if you're still experiencing the error when downloading/patching then please try:

- [Changing to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4) and
- [flushing your DNS cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq9)
You know, that's all I wish for as well.
